languages.text: "Надеюсь, вы хорошо провели время. Я-то точно не забуду судьбоносной встречи с Лорд-капитаном". {n}Флейтист ловко очищает игровое поле и заводит новую мелодию.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Надеюсь, вы хорошо провели время. Я-то точно не забуду судьбоносной встречи с Лорд-капитаном". {n}Флейтист ловко очищает игровое поле и заводит новую мелодию.{/n}

languages.text: "I hope you have enjoyed yourself. I certainly won't forget my fateful meeting with the Lord Captain." {n}The flute player clears the board in one deft movement and begins a new tune.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I hope you have enjoyed yourself. I certainly won't forget my fateful meeting with the Lord Captain." {n}The flute player clears the board in one deft movement and begins a new tune.{/n}
"I hope you have enjoyed yourself. I certainly won't forget my fateful meeting with the Lord Captain." {n}The flute player clears the board in one deft movement and begins a new tune.{/n}

"I hope you have enjoyed yourself. I certainly won't forget my fateful meeting with the Lord Captain." {n}The flute player clears the board in one deft movement, puts the rat into a tattered bag, and begins a new tune.{/n}

languages.text: « J'espère que vous avez passé un bon moment. Pour ma part, je pense ne jamais oublier le jour où j'ai rencontré {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}D'un geste visiblement expert, le joueur de flûte dégage le plateau avant d'entamer une nouvelle mélodie.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope you have enjoyed yourself. I certainly won't forget my fateful meeting with the Lord Captain." {n}The flute player clears the board in one deft movement and begins a new tune.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que vous avez passé un bon moment. Pour ma part, je pense ne jamais oublier le jour où j'ai rencontré {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}D'un geste visiblement expert, le joueur de flûte dégage le plateau avant d'entamer une nouvelle mélodie.{/n}

languages.text: «Espero que se haya divertido. Yo desde luego no olvidaré mi fatídico encuentro con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán». {n}El flautista despeja el tablero con un hábil gesto y comienza a tocar una nueva melodía.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope you have enjoyed yourself. I certainly won't forget my fateful meeting with the Lord Captain." {n}The flute player clears the board in one deft movement and begins a new tune.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Espero que se haya divertido. Yo desde luego no olvidaré mi fatídico encuentro con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán». {n}El flautista despeja el tablero con un hábil gesto y comienza a tocar una nueva melodía.{/n}

languages.text: 「楽しんでいただけましたか？ロード・キャプテンとの運命的な出会いは絶対に忘れません」{n}フルート吹きは手際よく遊戯盤を片付けて、新しい曲を演奏し始めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope you have enjoyed yourself. I certainly won't forget my fateful meeting with the Lord Captain." {n}The flute player clears the board in one deft movement and begins a new tune.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「楽しんでいただけましたか？ロード・キャプテンとの運命的な出会いは絶対に忘れません」{n}フルート吹きは手際よく遊戯盤を片付けて、新しい曲を演奏し始めた。{/n}

languages.text: “希望您玩得尽兴。我与舰长大人您这场宿命的会面，我是绝对不会忘记的。”{n}吹笛人以灵巧的动作清空了游戏板，开始吹起了新的曲子。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope you have enjoyed yourself. I certainly won't forget my fateful meeting with the Lord Captain." {n}The flute player clears the board in one deft movement and begins a new tune.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “希望您玩得尽兴。我与舰长大人您这场宿命的会面，我是绝对不会忘记的。”{n}吹笛人以灵巧的动作清空了游戏板，开始吹起了新的曲子。{/n}

languages.text: "Hoffentlich habt Ihr Euch amüsiert. Ich werde meine schicksalhafte Begegnung mit dem Lord Captain bestimmt nie vergessen." {n}Der Flötenspieler räumt das Feld mit einer geschickten Bewegung ab und stimmt ein neues Lied an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope you have enjoyed yourself. I certainly won't forget my fateful meeting with the Lord Captain." {n}The flute player clears the board in one deft movement and begins a new tune.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hoffentlich habt Ihr Euch amüsiert. Ich werde meine schicksalhafte Begegnung mit dem Lord Captain bestimmt nie vergessen." {n}Der Flötenspieler räumt das Feld mit einer geschickten Bewegung ab und stimmt ein neues Lied an.{/n}

languages.text: "Umarım keyifli vakit geçirmişsinizdir. Kendi adıma Lord Kaptan ile bu mukadder karşılaşmamı asla unutmayacağım." {n}Flütçü; tek bir ustaca hareketle tahtayı toparlıyor ve yeni bir melodiye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope you have enjoyed yourself. I certainly won't forget my fateful meeting with the Lord Captain." {n}The flute player clears the board in one deft movement and begins a new tune.{/n}
